high_descs: Move left to the wall on the right side of the sink where the towel holder is
Remove the hand towel from the towel holder on the wall
Carry the hand towel to the bathtub
Place the hand towel in the tub
anns.task_desc: Carry a hand towel to the bath tub

high_descs: Turn right and walk up to the right side of the right sink
Grab the hand towel from the towel rack next to the sink
Turn around and walk to the end of the bathtub
Put the hand towel in the bathtub
anns.task_desc: Put the hand towel in the bathtub

high_descs: Turn to the right and walk over to the towel holder on the wall in front of you.
Take the towel off the towel holder that is on the wall.
Turn around 360 degrees until you are at the bathtub.
Place the towel in the bathtub.
anns.task_desc: Move a towel from the towel holder to the tub.
